function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Public behavioral responses to COVID-19 and previous outbreaks of infectious diseases","Impact":"Potential for low levels of protective behaviors","Mitigation":"Increase public knowledge, perceived severity, and trust in official governmental media","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, educational programs","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of attention to official governmental media","Impact":"Reduced protective behaviors","Mitigation":"Enhance official governmental communication, improve trust in official sources","Technologies":"Social media monitoring, targeted messaging","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
